translations: n．污染，玷污：使纯洁、美好、神圣等事物变得不纯洁、不美好、不神圣的行为。
· The defilements of the environment are a major concern for many people.
环境污染是许多人关注的重要问题。

sentences.sentence: I shall now thoroughly cut away the bonds of all defilements.
sentences.translation: 我现在将要完全去除一切烦恼的束缚。

sentences.sentence: All other mental defilements are merely its twigs and branches.
sentences.translation: 其它一切心理杂染只是它的大小枝丫。

sentences.sentence: Here Samana means one who has calmed and destroyed all defilements.
sentences.translation: 这里沙门是指灭除一切烦恼的人。
